A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the daytime.
Amanda has just taken an incredible, bad dream as reality. The difference between reality and dream is that she can't find her parents in this world, but beside a beautiful greenery world, where everything is clean and quite of people.
